title: Energy Corridor/ CityCentre/ Briar Forest W/D Included
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
We are located in Houston TX 77042 feature a private patio balcony cathedral ceilings built in bookshelves and oversized closets.
Select apartments and townhomes include washer dryer connections and fireplaces.
All apartments and townhomes are pet friendly.
Green upgrades energy saving stainless steel appliances high efficiency air conditioning water saving shower heads and faucets and energy efficient lighting.
Four swimming pools sand volleyball and a playground on site.
Across from Lakeside Country Club and close to George Bush Park and dog park.
Easy access to I 10 Beltway 8 Loop 610 and the Westpark Tollway.
BE PART OF THE EXCITEMENT AS WE CREATE A WHOLE NEW LOOK FOR YOU!
In some Full size WD connections
In some apts Townhouse Style Floor Plans Available
Upgraded Cabinets, Counters & Lighting Upgraded flooring*
Washer/ Dryer Included or Washer/Dryer Connections
